Constructor Detail

Player

public Player(Room startRoom,
              java.lang.String name,
              int startSaving,
              int maxWeight,
              int startStep)
Create a new player. A player has a current room (the place where he is), a bag that contains items, and a number of golden teeth.

Method Detail

addWeight

public void addWeight(int weight)
Add the weight in parameter to the weight actually carried by the player.

controlCarriedWeight

public boolean controlCarriedWeight(int weight)
Control if the weight in parameter is positive and under the max weight.

Returns:
True if the weight can be carried by the player. False if it can not.

Returns:
